sentence: Facebook suspended Ohio senate candidate Josh Mandel for 24 hours after he posted an image that read, “Veterans Before Illegals,” which Facebook labeled “hate speech” and a violation of the company’s “community standards.” Facebook rescinded the ban and apologized to Mandel shortly after Breitbart News requested comment on the matter.
